coreAtributes.name: Enforcer Helmet
coreAtributes.description: A a metal helmet used by Enforcers

displacementText.playerSelf: You take off your enforcer helmet.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s enforcer helmet and roughly pull it off [npc.her] head.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your enforcer helmet and roughly pulls it off your head.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s enforcer helmet and roughly pulls it off [npc2.her] head.

replacementText.playerSelf: You put on the enforcer helmet.
replacementText.playerNPC: You put [npc.name]'s enforcer helmet on [npc.her] head.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the enforcer helmet on [npc.her] head.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] puts your enforcer helmet on your head.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly puts the enforcer helmet on your head.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] puts [npc2.name]'s enforcer helmet off on their head.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s enforcer helmet and roughly puts it on [npc2.her] head.

displacementText.playerSelf: You take off your enforcer helmet.
